item.description:
I'm meeting up with the GMC hike leader Keld Alstrup – 802-362-1422 at 8:30am at Shaw’s in Manchester Center, VT to meet and carpool to Merck Forest & Farmland Center

The Green Mountain Club will be meeting other hikers at the Visitor's Center around 9:00 am on January 15th, for a five mile round(approx. 4 hours) snowshoe trip up to Mt. Antone.

If your interested we can carpool from my Claremont/Ascuteny, park and ride I91 Exit 8 West (VT) side of the interstate at 7:15 am. 

Call me @ 603-477-5116 or text.

 

More information on Merck Foresthttp://www.google.com...

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hike with the Green Mountain Club GMC Mt Antoine 6 mi, Intermediate
